word: H5227 - נֹכַח - nôkach - no'-kakh - Against - எதிராக

sections.paragraph: ஆக, எதிராக, எதிரே, முன்பாக, எதிரான, நேராக, நேராய், சமூகத்தில், முகமுகமாய் - முன்னிடைச்சொல்
being in front of, in front of, opposite to, in the sight of, before, to the front, right on

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the same as H5226; properly, the front part; used adverbially (especially with a preposition), opposite, in front of, forward, in behalf of: - (over) against, before, direct [-ly], for, right (on).
Cognate: H5226, H5227, H5228, H5229
